title: irangadha saaminatha
sahitya:
irangAdA sAminAthA nin tiruvuLLam Ezhai en mIdu ippOdu



anupallavi



paramkAdA varam varadAradA sadA mudA puram kAinda sadAshiva sutA udAradA

tA



caraNam



dayA sadgunAlayA nATakapriyA pEdai En ayyA nambinEn ayyA narkkavi

kunjaradAsan enai ALa nal vELaiyAm idil
